channel.title: I froze my account on a pickup code help!
channel.description: well yeah i did the wrong pickup code and it froze my account up is there anyway i can get it back i know my friend can do it but hes not on right now it just stays at loading screen when i log on. thanks

item.title: I froze my account on a pickup code help!
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

[quote=“chick, post:4, topic:21904”]aber your stupid! and i have a server in the process and you no smart cuz all you do is create another account and go to the old1 that got froze and

1.go and create a new person of your choice and wait for it to auto save

2.then go characters and find your account that froze copy and paste all bank items and stats from the place that says [BANK] and [SKILLS] should look summthing like this…[ACCOUNT]
